con:parameter.con:name: seriesId
con:parameter.con:description: The series ID.

con:method.name: getComicsCollection
con:method.con:description: Fetches lists of comics filtered by a series id.

con:parameter.con:name: format
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by the issue format (e.g. comic, digital comic, hardcover).

con:parameter.con:name: formatType
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by the issue format type (comic or collection).

con:parameter.con:name: noVariants
con:parameter.con:description: Exclude variant comics from the result set.

con:parameter.con:name: dateDescriptor
con:parameter.con:description: Return comics within a predefined date range.

con:parameter.con:name: dateRange
con:parameter.con:description: Return comics within a predefined date range. Dates must be specified as date1,date2 (e.g. 2013-01-01,2013-01-02). Dates are preferably formatted as YYYY-MM-DD but may be sent as any common date format.

con:parameter.con:name: title
con:parameter.con:description: Return only issues in series whose title matches the input.

con:parameter.con:name: titleStartsWith
con:parameter.con:description: Return only issues in series whose title starts with the input.

con:parameter.con:name: startYear
con:parameter.con:description: Return only issues in series whose start year matches the input.

con:parameter.con:name: issueNumber
con:parameter.con:description: Return only issues in series whose issue number matches the input.

con:parameter.con:name: diamondCode
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by diamond code.

con:parameter.con:name: digitalId
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by digital comic id.

con:parameter.con:name: upc
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by UPC.

con:parameter.con:name: isbn
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by ISBN.

con:parameter.con:name: ean
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by EAN.

con:parameter.con:name: issn
con:parameter.con:description: Filter by ISSN.

con:parameter.con:name: hasDigitalIssue
con:parameter.con:description: Include only results which are available digitally.

con:parameter.con:name: modifiedSince
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics which have been modified since the specified date.

con:parameter.con:name: creators
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics which feature work by the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: characters
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics which feature the specified characters (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: events
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics which take place in the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: stories
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics which contain the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

con:parameter.con:name: sharedAppearances
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics in which the specified characters appear together (for example in which BOTH Spider-Man and Wolverine appear).

con:parameter.con:name: collaborators
con:parameter.con:description: Return only comics in which the specified creators worked together (for example in which BOTH Stan Lee and Jack Kirby did work).

con:parameter.con:name: orderBy
con:parameter.con:description: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

con:parameter.con:name: limit
con:parameter.con:description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

con:parameter.con:name: offset
con:parameter.con:description: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

con:representation.con:sampleContent: Too many values sent to a multi-value list filter.
